revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cave of Origin |image = [[File:Cave of Origin.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Cave of Origin. |tokens = 34,000 |location = On the West of Route 135, Northwest of Sootopolis City. }} '''Cave of Origin''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 390,000 |- | Exploud (Boss) || 1,000,000 |- | Kyogre (Boss) || 1,700,000 |- | Groudon (Boss) || 1,700,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Golbat * Sableye * Mawile * Exploud (boss) * Kyogre (boss) * Groudon (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 50% |}
